descriptionHTML:
Antix is the best video editing app for creating awesome shareable videos. Antix works with your Android smartphone and GoPro camera. Perfect for quickly creating videos of your action sports, holidays, adventures and all those amazing moments you capture. No in-app purchases - Antix is completely free!

VIDEO EDITING FEATURES

+ Edit videos from your gallery or capture from the app
+ Control and browse your GoPro camera to download clips straight into the video editor
+ Trim, flip and re-arrange video clips
+ Import multiple clips in one go
+ Add slow motion and colour enhancing filters
+ Add music tracks from our free collection
+ Volume equaliser for perfect sound balancing
+ Preview your video while you edit
+ Publish videos to your Antix profile and save to your camera roll
+ Instantly share to Facebook, Twitter and post to Instagram

GOPRO COMPATIBLE

- Connect and control your GoPro with WiFi
- Ride with Antix, and your phone will track your motion to identify all the awesome moments and download them straight to your phone
- Browse and select your favourite video clips from your GoPro and Antix will download them straight the Antix movie editor
- Works with GoPro Hero4, Hero3+, Hero3, Hero+ LCD, Hero4 Session*

DISCOVER

- Discover incredible videos on our explore page
- Like, comment and share your favourite videos from our community

We’re completely ad free!

Antix is an global community of action and extreme sports people. Watch awesome snowboard, ski, skateboard, MTB, BMX scooter, adventure and travel videos on our trending feed. Upload your video and get discovered!

Every day we feature a new Antix video on our FB, Instagram, Twitter and YouTube profiles...if you’d like to get featured get creating with Antix now.

Scrub less, shred more!


Have any feedback? Email us at team@antixapp.com

www.antixapp.com


Follow us on:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/antixapp
Twitter: https://twitter.com/antixapp
Instagram: https://instagram.com/antixapp/
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEyxZgVCh2mmJwoTdCZiQTw

*Please update the firmware of your GoPro camera to the latest version before you use this application.
comments: I just downloaded this app and tried it immediately. I like how simple and easy it is to use. But I think it needs a lot of improvement in the future update. Let me name some!  *muting option. *the video clip is limited eventhough I have trimmed all of my clips. *when you select a music, it does nothing. *option to insert your own music. *option to apply different filter from diferrent clip (this one is objective because I wasn't able to watch my final video. But I just noticed that if you select a filter from a clip, the same filter applies to the next clip even if you already selected a filter for it.  Guys, this is an amazing app. Only if you could provide those that I have mentioned. I would love to give this a 5 star rating soon.

Haven't been able to use it for my purpose. I have a Gopro and used the Time Lapse feature to film while painting a large mural. I have moved all the photos into my Samsung TabS2 Gallery. After tap "+" then "Gallery" nothing shows. I know the pics are there, other editing apps can find them fine. I double checked permissions and Antix has full permissions. Couldn't find troubleshoot anywhere. Maybe someone here has had similar issue and knows fix. Thanks

THIS IS THE BEST VIDEO EDITING APP IN PLAY STORE !!! THIS APP IS DAMN AWESOME REALLY DEVELOPER!! I RESPECT YOUR AWESOME WORK !! THIS IS SO VERY EASY TO USE AND THAT'S WHY I DON'T HAVE TO USE MY PC!! THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR SUCH AN AMAZING APP !!!
App appears perfect at first but I cant split my long videos into multiple short ones. I can only edit 1 highlight per video.
